name: apify-act-mongodb-import
description: This act import array of object to specific MongoDB colection. Designes to use in Apify env.

scripts.run-local: KEEP_HOSTS=1 APIFY_LOCAL_EMULATION_DIR=./apify_local APIFY_DEFAULT_KEY_VALUE_STORE_ID=default APIFY_DEFAULT_DATASET_ID=default node main.js

author: Jakub Drobnik <jakub.drobnik@apify.com>
